name: stepdevcode-tech
description: Portfolio website với Next.js, TypeScript và animations đẹp mắt

scripts.dev:open: start npm run dev && timeout /t 8 /nobreak >nul && start http://localhost:3000
scripts.build:static: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('app/api'))fs.renameSync('app/api','app_api_tmp');if(fs.existsSync('app/habit'))fs.renameSync('app/habit','app_habit_tmp');" && cross-env STATIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_STATIC_BUILD=true next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('out','static','index.html');const dest=path.join('out','index.html');if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('Copied static index to out/index.html');}" && node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('app_api_tmp'))fs.renameSync('app_api_tmp','app/api');if(fs.existsSync('app_habit_tmp'))fs.renameSync('app_habit_tmp','app/habit');"
